name: 11 Steps
description:
Team Name: Nacreous Games

Team:

- Metin Ferati
- Kristi Hila
- Fabio Saupp
- Danie Grobbelaar
- James Oliver

Controls:
Left mouse button to move and do normal attack, if blue bar is full hold in right mouse button over the enemies and select as many as you can. The arcade game is played with the arrows.
The last level is played with "A", "D" (left and right) and space bar to jump.

Used non-original assets:
-Animations on main character done with Mixamo
-“Fat Unicorn” https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/fat-unicorn
-AI Behavior Toolkit: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/ai-behavior-toolkit
